name: tool_process_ordinary_page
description:
SUMMARY: Scrapes a general web page to extract the main readable text content, stripping HTML boilerplate.

LOGIC (ЛОГИКА РАБОТЫ):
1. Initiates a web crawler/scraper request to the URL.
2. Downloads the HTML DOM.
3. Applies readability algorithms to remove navigation, ads, scripts, and styling.
4. Returns the clean Markdown or plain text of the main content area.

RETURN VALUE (ВОЗВРАЩАЕМОЕ ЗНАЧЕНИЕ):
Returns a JSON object: { "status": "success" | "error", "content": "string (cleaned text)", "page_title": "string", "error_detail": "string (optional)" }.

ERRORS (ВОЗМОЖНЫЕ ОШИБКИ):
- "HTTP_ERROR_[CODE]": e.g., 403 Forbidden, 404 Not Found.
- "TIMEOUT": Target site took too long to respond.
- "EMPTY_CONTENT": Parser could not identify main content (e.g., purely JS-rendered app without SSR).

url.description: The target website URL to scrape.
